app_account_id.title: Application Deployment Account Id
app_account_id.description: Account Id to deploy the Application within

pipeline_account_id.title: Pipeline Account Id
pipeline_account_id.description: Account Id to deploy the Pipeline

AppName.title: Application Name
AppName.description: Identifies the name of the application

NamePrefix.title: Name Prefix
NamePrefix.description: Appended a prefix to resources to have unique names

OrgUnitId.title: Organization Unit Id
OrgUnitId.description: The Id of the organizational unit

PrimaryOperatingRegion.title: Application Deployment Region
PrimaryOperatingRegion.description: The primary region you are operating in

ProductOwner.title: Service Catalog Product Owner
ProductOwner.description: Product owner name used for Service Catalog products

RepositoryName.title: Source Repository Name
RepositoryName.description: Name of the repository where source, configuration files are stored

EnabledRegions.title: Enabled Regions
EnabledRegions.description: List of all regions the network will be operating in

Environments.title: Environments *
Environments.description: List of environments. Note: The Environments specified here must match the environments specified in the application

DeployVPCForImageBuilder.title: Deploy VPC for Image Builder
DeployVPCForImageBuilder.description: Toggle to create and tag a Spoke VPC for compatibility with SCF Endpoint Security product

GlobalCloudCIDRList.title: Global Cloud CIDRs *
GlobalCloudCIDRList.description: List of CIDRs used for the primary pool

RegionCIDRNetmaskLength.title: Region CIDR Network Mask Length
RegionCIDRNetmaskLength.description: The CIDR size you wish to allocate to the region pools (ex: 16 is /16)

DefaultRegionCIDRQuantity.title: Default Region CIDR Quantity
DefaultRegionCIDRQuantity.description: The number of region pools per region. Note: When 3 CIDR blocks are running out, you will need to manually add another CIDR block allocated to that region

EnableGlobalSG.title: Enable Global Security Group
EnableGlobalSG.description: Toggle to enable global security group

FirewallVersion.title: Firewall Version
FirewallVersion.description: It is recommended not to change the Firewall version. This is because the version numbers are dynamically found using this input. If it is changed, the Panorama will be completely redeployed.

FirewallInstanceSpecs.title: Firewall Instance Specifications
FirewallInstanceSpecs.description: Available compute levels: low=25gbit/sec & minimal compute; medium=25gbit/sec; max=50gbit/s

DeployPrivateRootCA.title: Deploy Private Root CA
DeployPrivateRootCA.description: Toggle to deploy private root CA

VPCEndptIngressCIDR.title: VPC Endpoint Ingress CIDR
VPCEndptIngressCIDR.description: The CIDR for centralized endpoint ingress

SendLogsToLogAggregationPlatform.title: Send Logs To Log Aggregation Platform (LAP)
SendLogsToLogAggregationPlatform.description: Toggle connection to SCF LAP.  SCF LAP must be deployed in order for SendLogsToLogAggregationPlatform to be enabled

AllowedCidrs.title: Allowed CIDRs *
AllowedCidrs.description: List of allowed CIDRs to come through the global load balancer. This is for testing purposes

EnableGlobalWaf.title: Enable Global WAF
EnableGlobalWaf.description: Toggle whether to enable Global WAF

EnablePanorama.title: Enable Panorama
EnablePanorama.description: Begin with EnablePanorama set to false (unchecked) so the underlying infrastructure can first deploy successfully. Once it has deployed successfully without the nested stack, set the toggle to true (checked) and commit and push the Panorama deployment

DeployTestNetwork.title: Deploy Test Network
DeployTestNetwork.description: Toggle test network for checking traffic flow

DeploySSNetwork.title: Deploy Shared Services Network
DeploySSNetwork.description: Toggle to deploy Shared Services Network

FMSSecurityGroupsRemediationEnabled.title: Enable FMS Security Group Remediation
FMSSecurityGroupsRemediationEnabled.description: Toggle whether Firewall Manager findings should be automatically remediated

PanoramaVersion.title: Panorama Version
PanoramaVersion.description: It is recommended not to change the Panorama version. This is because the version numbers are dynamically found using this input. If it is changed, the Panorama will be completely redeployed.

PanoramaSerialPrimary.title: Panorama Serial Primary
PanoramaSerialPrimary.description: The serial number for the primary Panorama

PanoramaSerialSecondary.title: Panorama Serial Secondary
PanoramaSerialSecondary.description: The serial number for the secondary Panorama

PanoramaInstanceSpecs.title: Panorama Instance Specifications
PanoramaInstanceSpecs.description: Run Panorama on 4xLarge or 8xLarge instances. 4xLarge is “minimum” and 8xLarge is “recommended” according to Palo Alto best practices.

PanoramaHAMode.title: Panorama HA mode
PanoramaHAMode.description: Toggle Panorama to be highly available

PanoAdminAccessCidrs.title: Panorama Admin Access CIDRs
PanoAdminAccessCidrs.description: List of CIDRs that are allowed to access Panorama

PanoAdminInternalAccessCidrs.title: Panorama Admin Internal Access CIDRs
PanoAdminInternalAccessCidrs.description: List of internal CIDRs that are allowed to access Panorama

TestNetworkAccount.title: Test Network Account
TestNetworkAccount.description: The account the test network is shared to

SharedServicesAccount.title: Shared Services Account
SharedServicesAccount.description: The account ID of the Shared Services account

GlobalWafOUs.title: List of Organization Unit Ids used for Global WAF *

GlobalWafWhiteListIps.title: List of Global WAF IPs to be whitelisted/enabled

GlobalWafBlackListIps.title: List of Global WAF IPs to be blacklisted/blocked

RootCAName.title: Root CA Name
RootCAName.description: The root name of the Certificate Authority

RootCAKeyAlgorithm.title: Root CA Key Algorithm
RootCAKeyAlgorithm.description: The options for key algorithms are “RSA_2048”, “EC_256”, “EC_384”, “RSA_4096”

RootCAValidityInYears.title: Root CA Validity in Years
RootCAValidityInYears.description: Indicate how many years the Certificate Authority is valid

GlobalPHZDomainName.title: Global PHZ Domain Name
GlobalPHZDomainName.description: The domain name for your private hosted zone

DNSIngressCIDR.title: DNS Ingress CIDR
DNSIngressCIDR.description: The CIDR range that is allowed to talk to private DNS

EnableReverseDNS.title: Enable Reverse DNS
EnableReverseDNS.description: Toggle to enable reverse DNS which resolves an IP address back to its domain name

CentralVPCEndpoints.title: Central VPC Endpoint Parameters
CentralVPCEndpoints.description: Toggle the VPC endpoints you would like to deploy. It is possible that the deployment may face issues due to too many resources being deployed at once. To avoid this, you can stagger the deployment by disabling/unchecking some of the Central VPC Endpoints and enabling them in a separate commit and push to the repository. If it still fails to provision, retrying may be the solution

GlobalReversePHZDomainName.title: Global Reverse PHZ Domain Name
GlobalReversePHZDomainName.description: The domain name for the reverse DNS IP address lookup

regionName.title: Region Name
regionName.description: Region to deploy specific parameters to

EnableFirewalls.title: Enable Firewalls
EnableFirewalls.description: EnableFirewalls must first be 'unchecked' before the Panoramas are deployed. Only check when the Panorama is ready and configured, because they will not be able to connect with Panorama. It takes about 20 minutes for the Panorama to spin up successfully with no problems

TransitGatewayASN.title: Transit Gateway ASN
TransitGatewayASN.description: The Transit Gateway (TGW) Autonomous System Number (ASN) as a string

ResolverName.title: Resolver Name
ResolverName.description: Resolver name used by resolver rule to determine where to route the traffic

ResolverDomain.title: Resolver Domain
ResolverDomain.description: Domain used by resolver rule to determine where to route the traffic

ResolverTargetIps.title: Resolver Target IPs
ResolverTargetIps.description: List of target IPs used by resolver rule to determine where to route the traffic

FirewallAuthKey.title: Firewall Authorization Key
FirewallAuthKey.description: The firewall authorization key as a string

AppConnectorVersion.title: App Connector Version
AppConnectorVersion.description: The release date of the current app connector version

AppConnectorUpgradeDay.title: App Connector Upgrade Day
AppConnectorUpgradeDay.description: The desired upgrade day for the app connectors

AppConnectorUpgradeTimeInSeconds.title: App Connector Upgrade Time In Seconds
AppConnectorUpgradeTimeInSeconds.description: The desired upgrade start time in seconds

AppConnectorKeyUsageLimit.title: App Connector Key Usage Limit
AppConnectorKeyUsageLimit.description: Amount of times App Connector Provisioning Key can be used

ASGMaxSize.title: Auto Scaling Group Maximum Size
ASGMaxSize.description: Maximimum number of App Connectors per Auto Scaling Group

ASGMinSize.title: Auto Scaling Group Minimum Size
ASGMinSize.description: Minimum number of App Connectors per Auto Scaling Group

ASGDesiredCapacity.title: Auto Scaling Group Desired Capacity
ASGDesiredCapacity.description: Desired number of initial App Connectors to deploy

ZiaPolicyAsCodeEnabled.title: Enable Zia Policy As Code
ZiaPolicyAsCodeEnabled.description: Toggle to enable Zia Policy As Code
